description.full: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe. The superb future-sport game from the legendary Bitmap Brothers is now available on Xbox LIVE Arcade. Play this fast-paced and utterly brutal game with its classic 2D graphics fully intact, or go full on with the new super-enhanced High Definition 3D visuals. Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe offers you the sporting world of the future! Smash your way to the top of the league in the solo game or go head to head locally or LIVE. Includes 32 teams, 4 leagues, cup and knockout competitions, team enhancements, personalised team strips, management and training options, and LIVE Ranked Preset or Ranked Career games. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Single Player Cup, Knockout, League and League Manager, Xbox LIVE multiplayer 1-2, local multiplayer 1-2. Speedball2 Brutal Deluxe, the classic game from the legendary Bitmap Brothers, now available to download from Xbox LIVE Arcade. Play the fast-paced brutal futuristic sport in its original or enhanced glory!
